div.p: Onset codes from the Human Phenotype Ontology and SNOMED CT.
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li: Include codes from http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/hp.owl where concept descends from HP:0003674 (Onset)
Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 282032007 (Periods of life)

description.value: Onset codes from the Human Phenotype Ontology and SNOMED CT.
